code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import defaultImg from'./profile.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){const[image,setImage]=useState(defaultImg);const handleImageUpload=e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(file){const imageUrl=URL.createObjectURL(file);setImage(imageUrl);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to CRODE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"Profile",className:"profile-pic"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Jayden McBride"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Student Developer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\"Passionate about sports, tech, and helping others.\""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"upload-label",children:["Upload Profile Picture",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleImageUpload})]})]})]});}export default Dashboard;
